message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I believe it could greatly benefit your business operations. Given its value to you, I propose an initial offer of $1200000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your valuation of our product. To further explore this opportunity, I would like to counter your offer with $1150000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1075000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value the product will bring to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value proposition and our costs, I would like to propose a price of $1125000 for the product. This allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while still being competitive in the market.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1075000. I'm willing to meet you at $1100000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $1100000 for the product. This brings us to a mutually beneficial agreement, allowing us to both achieve our desired outcomes.
